name: Hungry Creatures TD
description:
Protect your kitchen from the creatures that wanna eat everything.

Use the mouse to move the cursor, left click to select things and right click to use menus. Optionally you can use the arrows to move the cursor, z for menu and x to select if you keep the mouse out of the game screen. It's also playable on phjone with touch controls but it's not the best experience.

Hope you enjoy this little game :)

Check out https://dalice-g.itch.io for more games and https://twitter.com/GorgoAlice for updates, art and whatever i do next
